Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: Senaida Chavana
Reviews.Content: I liked this product because my job entails me to work with heavy equipment.  This phone is strong and sturdy.  I like the ruggedness feel of the phone.I don't like too much the choices on the ringtones.I like the easy instructions to follow on how to use it.  I recommend this phone for those who work outside!

Reviews.Title: sonim xp strike
Reviews.Author: Zach Doty
Reviews.Content: this phone is great loved it when I got it but it proved its ruggedness when it had went threw a snow blower on a john deere utility tractor into the snow bank and it still works with very little damage some of the plastic around the edge of the phone was cut ant is still water proof, (it sat in the snow bank for a month because I could not find when I found it just charged it and it was good as new )

Reviews.Title: great for the job site
Reviews.Author: An Engineer "Happy Shopping!"
Reviews.Content: Phone can withstand a beating, great for those who work outdoors. It has rubber doors covering all the ports. The Sonim XP Strike offers a 3 year manufactures warranty (compared to the standard 1 year), which includes accidental damage coverage. That is almost an unheard of warranty for cell phones. The XP Strike meets military 810G specs for dust, shock, vibration and blowing rain but goes beyond that with IP86 certification for dust proofing and submersion resistance. They say you can dunk the XP Strike in up to 6.5 feet of water, leave it in there for half an hour and it will come out working perfectly ... I haven't tried it, on purpose but more than likely will happen soon enough by accident.I suggest buying an additional charger car and wall kit:The Essential Gomadic Car and Wall Accessory Kit for the Sonim XP Strike - 12v DC Car and AC Wall Charger Solutions with TipExchangeAlternatively I found this interesting 2 in 1 car and wall charger, great for traveling:Sonim XP Strike compatible Advanced Gomadic 2 in 1 Auto / Car DC Charger with Foldable Wall AC Charging plug - Amazing design built with TipExchange TechnologyIf you need a charge while on the job site I found this neat little pocket sized portable charge:Unique Gomadic Portable Rechargeable Battery Pack designed for the Sonim XP Strike - High Capacity Gomadic charger that fits in your pocketIf you are out on remote location there are solar chargers available as well:Gomadic SunVolt High Output Portable Solar Power Station designed for the Sonim XP Strike - Can charge multiple devices with outlet speedsHappy Shopping!

Reviews.Title: Hate it

Reviews.Content: I have to. Carry this brick all day as the company i work for issued them to us.  It is way too heavy, too thick, an all around burden to lug around.  Combine that with the sprint network who services it and you Have the worst phone ive ever owned.  The 2 way comunication is terrible. Its not like nextel. They tried and failed.
